description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1000.
John's model can adapt and choose option 2 in response to Kate choosing 2, overriding its default
Mutual defection (both choosing 2) incurs severe penalties, making cooperation (both choosing 1) safer despite no gain (since mutual defection multiplies losses by 1000).
